product_name: The North Face PR Morningside Full-Zip Fleece Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The North Face collaborated with Boarding for Breast Cancer to create the limited edition women's PR Morningside Full-Zip heavyweight fleece jacket that'll keep you cozy and warm all winter. 100% polyester plush fleece has super-cozy, soft fleece backing; offers UPF 50+ sun protection. Pink ribbon is embroidered on the left sleeve. PR Morningside Full-Zip Fleece Jacket from The North Face offers zippered handwarmer pockets. The North Face donates annually to Boarding with Breast Cancer; other organizations were also involved in the collaboration that created this jacket. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face collaborated with Boarding for Breast Cancer to create the limited edition women's PR Morningside Full-Zip heavyweight fleece jacket that'll keep you cozy and warm all winter.
